meanings.definition: A rare phosphate mineral with the chemical formula (Na,K)₅(Fe³⁺,Mg)₂[PO₄]₄(OH)₃·9H₂O.
meanings.english_definition: A rare phosphate mineral with the chemical formula (Na,K)₅(Fe³⁺,Mg)₂[PO₄]₄(OH)₃·9H₂O.

examples.sentence: The farrisite crystal was very small and difficult to analyze.
examples.translation: そのfarrisiteの結晶は非常に小さく、分析が困難でした。

etymology.value: Named after Robert Farris, an American mineral collector who first discovered it.
